string.name: what_s_new_toast
string.font:
- Replaced the "Albums" tab with "Videos," accessible from the bottom navigation bar and library shortcuts. 
 - Improved the two-pane layout with smoother animations and better handling of screen cutouts (insets). 
 - Enhanced immersive mode to use swipe gestures for showing system bars, improving usability. 
 - Refined UI styling with more rounded corners for newly added items and improved shadows in the directory browser. 
 - Updated internal libraries for better performance and stability.

item.font:
We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 We're utilizing the new, advanced NowPlaying API for real-time updates regarding playback metadata state. 
 We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size. 
 More App Widget styles are coming soon.
